name: Gallade E4 LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Blade Storm
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Gallade E4 LV.X from your hand onto your Active Gallade E4, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aimed Cut
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Gallade E4. Gallade E4 LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
